title: Jayce Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer Cooldown
body:
Just noticed this as a bug, and was wondering if anyone else noticed this.

Jayces Ultimate his "R" ability Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer does not actually reduce in time with cooldown reduction, the tooltip says that it does but when played it still is around 6 seconds with 40% cooldown reduction when it should be 3.6 seconds.

Thank you anyone else encounter this?

replies.body: Cooldowns are working fine for me
